marklogic.body: I have social Anxiety. It's very hard for me to leave my apartment at times. I enjoy myself when I go out, but I often wouldn't work up the gumption to go if my friends didn't pressure me into it. Same with trips, the minute before leaving I attempt to punk out, and I probably would if I didn't have a friendly foot on my butt pushing me out the door. Although I largely agree with your piece on consent, I would argue that helping friends out of their Comfort zones can be a good thing.
